plot: A 17-year-old abandons her childhood dream to dance when she is diagnosed with cancer but discovers something about herself along the way. Beautiful underwater footage is captured by her father.
title: Like a Dance
plot_es: A 17-year-old abandons her childhood dream to dance when she is diagnosed with cancer but discovers something about herself along the way. Beautiful underwater footage is captured by her father.
plot_en: A 17-year-old abandons her childhood dream to dance when she is diagnosed with cancer but discovers something about herself along the way. Beautiful underwater footage is captured by her father.
